category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOM_Mirror_TypePrefixSuffix
preference.preference_description: Defines the type of item to be used when creating an item in a manufacturing BOM through the me_create_mbom utility. It also defines the prefix and suffix for the name of the item instance. Valid Values: Valid values are in the format ItemType,Prefix,Suffix, in which the character (,) is the separator. The prefix or suffix are optional.
